open Set

variable {Γ : Type*} [Group Γ]
variable {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X] [MulAction Γ X]

/-- Each group element acts by an isometry. -/
variable (h_isometry : ∀ γ : Γ, Isometry (fun x : X => γ • x))

/-- The action is free: only the identity fixes a point. -/
def free_action : Prop :=
  ∀ (γ : Γ) (x : X), γ • x = x → γ = 1

/-- Each orbit is a discrete subset of X. -/
def discrete_orbits : Prop :=
  ∀ x : X, (IsDiscrete (MulAction.orbit Γ x : Set X))

/-- The group action is a covering action iff it is free with discrete orbits. -/
theorem covering_action_iff_free_and_discrete_orbits :
  -- placeholder for the covering action predicate
  (True) ↔ (free_action ∧ discrete_orbits) := by sorry

variable {Γ : Type*} [Group Γ]
variable {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X] [MulAction Γ X]

def free_action : Prop :=
  ∀ (γ : Γ) (x : X), γ • x = x → γ = 1

/-- Each orbit is a discrete subset of X, expressed metrically: every point of an orbit
    has a small ball that meets the orbit only in that point. -/
def discrete_orbits : Prop :=
  ∀ x y, (∃ γ : Γ, y = γ • x) → ∃ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε ∧
    ∀ z, (∃ γ : Γ, z = γ • x) → dist z y < ε → z = y

/-- The action is a covering action (here formulated for isometric actions):
    for every x there is a ball around x whose distinct translates are disjoint. -/
def covering_action : Prop :=
  ∀ x : X, ∃ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε ∧
    ∀ (γ : Γ), γ ≠ 1 → (∀ y, dist y x < ε → ¬ (dist (γ • y) x < ε))

/-- For an action by isometries, the action is a covering action iff it is
    free and has discrete orbits. -/
theorem covering_action_iff_free_and_discrete_orbits (h : h_isometry) :
  covering_action ↔ (free_action ∧ discrete_orbits) := by sorry

variable (act : Γ → X → X)
variable (act_one : act 1 = fun x => x)
variable (act_mul : ∀ (g h : Γ) (x : X), act (g * h) x = act g (act h x))

/-- Each group element acts by an isometry. -/
variable (h_isometry : ∀ γ : Γ, Isometry (act γ))

def orbit_set (x : X) : Set X := { y | ∃ γ : Γ, y = act γ x }

def free_action : Prop :=
  ∀ (γ : Γ) (x : X), act γ x = x → γ = 1

    meeting the orbit only at that point. -/
def discrete_orbits : Prop :=
  ∀ (x : X) (y : X), y ∈ orbit_set act x → ∃ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε ∧
    ∀ z, z ∈ orbit_set act x → dist z y < ε → z = y

/-- The group action is a covering action: for each x there is an ε such that the
    ε-ball about x has pairwise disjoint translates under distinct group elements. -/
def covering_action : Prop :=
  ∀ x : X, ∃ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε ∧
    ∀ (γ : Γ), γ ≠ 1 → (image (fun y => act γ y) { y | dist y x < ε } ∩ { y | dist y x < ε } = ∅)

/-- For an action by isometries, the action is a covering action iff it is
    free and has discrete orbits. -/
theorem covering_action_iff_free_and_discrete_orbits :
  covering_action act ↔ (free_action act ∧ discrete_orbits act) := by sorry

variable {Γ : Type*} [Group Γ]

def free_action : Prop :=
  ∀ (γ : Γ) (x : X), act γ x = x → γ = 1

/-- The orbit of a point as a set. -/
def orbit_set (x : X) : Set X := { y | ∃ γ : Γ, y = act γ x }

/-- Each orbit is discrete in the metric sense: every point of an orbit has a ball
    meeting the orbit only at that point. -/
def discrete_orbits : Prop :=
  ∀ (x : X) (y : X), y ∈ orbit_set act x → ∃ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε ∧
    ∀ z : X, z ∈ orbit_set act x → dist z y < ε → z = y

/-- The group action is a covering action: for each x there is an ε such that the
    ε-ball about x has pairwise disjoint translates under distinct group elements. -/
def covering_action : Prop :=
  ∀ x : X, ∃ ε : ℝ, 0 < ε ∧
    ∀ (γ : Γ), γ ≠ 1 → ∀ y : X, dist y x < ε → ¬ (dist (act γ y) x < ε)

/-- For an action by isometries, the action is a covering action iff it is
    free and has discrete orbits. -/

  covering_action act ↔ (free_action act ∧ discrete_orbits act) := by sorry
